block.p: DEBROVNER-Lillian. Age 91, on May 28, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Jack. Cherished mother of Dr. Charles Debrovner and Brenda Beckenstein. Adored grandmother of Jill, Diane, Kim and Caroline. Devoted great-grandmother of Amanda, Abigail, Corey, Dylan and Halle. Services on Monday, May 29, 10 AM, at Weinstein West End Funeral Chapel, 1283 Coney Island Ave., Brooklyn. The family will be receiving friends at 2302 Avenue O, Brooklyn, on Sunday, June 4, from 12 to 4 PM.
